reviews.text: The review is for the Urgent Care Centre, and fortunately, we didn't need any exams during this visit. I didn't expect to go to the ER for my 8-month-old son since he wasn't feeling well, but the staff, from the front desk to the nurses, were all very welcoming. The doctor was very friendly and patient; he spoke English very well.

I fell down at home on my left knee which had a TKR before, the whole knee was swollen for almost a month, my daughter was very concerned of a possible  fracture. Dr nich is so gentle. glad that I decided to get an xray to confirm no fractures and my daughter stopped nagging at me every night.

No idea of anything and Parkway is a duopoly for private health care. This place needs to fire the CEO and COO and entire upper mgmt staff. No idea of operational what is going on and only excuses. Disgraceful as a Singaporean to have such a company running healthcare.

A premium private hospital with excellent facilities and medical practitioners. While the fees are also premium, you generally get fast consultation appointments versus public hospital and more dedicated medical attention. Popular with locals and foreigners from the ASEAN countries. Parking is the only negative aspect due to very limited space. The saving grace is turnaround time is quite fast, usually if you can wait a bit you will get a lot.
This happens everyday, not even once is all 3 in working condition.
